name: babe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary a small baby: a newborn babe
informal a word you can use when you are talking to someone you love such as your wife, husband, partner, etc.: It's up to you, babe. I'll do whatever you say.
informal a sexually attractive young person: He's a total babe.
